title: The Halo
desc:
Post 36
- If you manage to discard a** Deal With The Devil** (Item 32) without using it, the next time you may draw this the next time you draw items.
- Increase your max <:charge:1240849067362488403>s by 1.
- If you have already used The Halo before, turns into **God's Waiver** (Item 33).
